metadata.title: CVE-2019-20218 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: selectExpander in select.c in SQLite 3.30.1 proceeds with WITH stack unwinding even after a parsing error.

notes.note: mdeslaur> tests hang when this is backported to earlier releases

criterions.comment: sqlite3 package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.31.1-1ubuntu1').
